links.*: Of Tuor and the Fall of Gondolin
The Tale of Years (The War of the Jewels)

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|506|507|509|510|511|512|525}}
==Midsummer==
* The [[Fall of Gondolin]]: [[Morgoth]] attacks [[Gondolin]] with an army of [[orcs]], [[dragons]], [[wolves]] and [[balrogs]].<ref name="Gondolin">{{S|Gondolin}}</ref><ref>{{WJ|Years}}, p. 351</ref>
* [[Ecthelion]] dies killing [[Gothmog (balrog)|Gothmog]], Lord of Balrogs.<ref name="Gondolin"/>
* Deaths of King [[Turgon]] and many chieftains of the [[Twelve houses of the Gondothlim|noble houses]] of Gondolin.<ref name="Gondolin"/>
* [[Maeglin]] takes [[Idril]] and [[Eärendil]]. [[Tuor]] kills Maeglin.<ref name="Gondolin"/>
* [[Idril]] and [[Tuor]] lead a group of [[Exiles of Gondolin|survivors]] out a [[Idril's secret way|secret tunnel]] and across the [[Cirith Thoronath]]. [[Glorfindel]] dies there killing a Balrog. The exiles wander towards the [[Mouths of Sirion]].<ref name="Gondolin"/>
* [[Gil-galad]] becomes [[High King of the Noldor]].<ref name="Gondolin"/>

{{references}}
